name: EIGHTY 6 HOLDING LIMITED
description: Developer of an online procurement tool intended to bridge the gap between restaurants and suppliers by making ordering and fulfillment hassle-free. The company's platform allows the buyer to review, place orders, and track orders on the go allowing the vendors to aggregate, promote, and communicate with several buyers at the touch of a button, enabling restaurants to streamline and facilitate the entire procurement process by getting access to a procurement app and communication channel.
one_liner: Developer of an online procurement tool intended to bridge the gap between restaurants and suppliers by making ordering and fulfillment hassle-free. The company's platform allows the buyer to review, place orders, and track orders on the go allowing the vendors to aggregate, promote, and communicate with several buyers at the touch of a button, enabling restaurants to streamline and facilitate the entire procurement process by getting access to a procurement app and communication channel.
